title: C&M League - UI/UX Designer Election
body:
### Summary

Governance opened one part-time position for UI/UX and Communication Designer, and collected applications over 2 weeks.

With this poll, the community selects which candidates will join current members for the next Communication & Marketing League mandate.

### Details
[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-communication-marketing-league-v2-0-open-applications/592) collects applications submitted between Aug 10th and Aug 24th and reports info about areas of responsibility and compensations.

[**If you need additional information, read the Leagues feedback on candidates before submitting your vote**](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-communication-marketing-league-v2-0-open-applications/592/10).
 
Candidates:
@Dele2021- Part-time, Senior level 1: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-communication-marketing-league-v2-0-open-applications/592/2) 
@sunny - Part-time, Junior level: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-communication-marketing-league-v2-0-open-applications/592/6)
@Luka_p - Part-time, Senior level 1: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-communication-marketing-league-v2-0-open-applications/592/7)

Governance will select the most voted candidates that will fill 1 part-time position.

The minimum voting threshold for a candidate to be elected is 10’000 IDLE votes.
If candidates do not fully cover open positions (e.g. no one reaches the threshold), an ongoing application process will be set up, letting new candidates join the League in the future.

This Temperature Check complies with the [stkIDLE Voting Framework](https://gov.idle.finance/t/voting-framework-for-stkidle-holders/567)

This poll is available for both [$IDLE token holders](https://snapshot.org/#/idlefinance.eth) and [stkIDLE holders](https://snapshot.org/#/staking.idlefinance.eth) 

The final $IDLE voting weights will be calculated using the [approved calculator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BnH9boRmBADuyquvDMh0AmQfF97Zj76sIENKtySLU8o/edit?usp=sharing) 


### Vote options

* Elect @Dele2021
* Elect @sunny
* Elect @Luka_p
* None of the above

For this election we are using Snapshot with the “Weighted voting” strategy, allowing voters to distribute their voting weight across different options. Please note that *it's possible to change the votes anytime*, until the voting window is closed.
author: 0x2fa92128ecE3901395448bf62Dd5Ff6a35871540
